Ancestry-Gnome -- Female Gnome Novice Fighter
Attributes (5 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Tough: +1 Vigor Step
Skills (13 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d8 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Gnome; Sylvan
Skill Notes:
Keen Senses: +1 Notice Step
Obsessive: +1 Skill Point (d4 in choice of Smarts skill)
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Size: -1 Alignment: Neutral
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 4
Description Notes: Size-1: -1 Size
Features
Edges (3 points): Danger Sense; Fame; Fighter Hindrances: Can't Swim; Cautious; Suspicious+ Gnome Features: Gnome Magic; Keen Senses; Low Light Vision; Obsessive; Reduced Pace; Size -1; Tough
Feature Notes:
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Cautious: Requires a detailed plan before acting
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Suspicious+: Allies suffer -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Size-1: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Martial Flexibility: May gain the benefits of a combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Arcana
Power Points: 1
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective

Notes
